name: Wyoming B. PARIS, Appellant, v. REST LAND MEMORIAL PARK, INC., and Lincoln Memorial Gardens, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Paris v. Rest Land Memorial Park, Inc.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Wyoming B. PARIS, Appellant, v. REST LAND MEMORIAL PARK, INC., and Lincoln Memorial Gardens, Inc.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Jay Harris Feldstein, Feldstein, Bloom & Grinberg, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
349 A.2d 910
Wyoming B. PARIS, Appellant, v. REST LAND MEMORIAL PARK, INC., and Lincoln Memorial Gardens, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 29, 1976.
Louis Vaira, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jay Harris Feldstein, Feldstein, Bloom & Grinberg, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
